descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal. 
[media]
[media]
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
[media]
[media]
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
[media]
[media]
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal.

Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001714_1507974673219564_1452701867122163118_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=A6xPaiPiC0UQ7kNvwHk9Pk_&_nc_oc=Adl-ox4gzCvD9ZD_BkZeW9Wn0cJAF9Fr9fO8muxZDLja5b6LUizO-5fNwHPqrl9PnPU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=vyJXQtjp8DAWkxhNGLqp6A&oh=00_AfJG0R-5nc-u2guPbxHO9In-FrgkSFqnV16woiVpILh1Ig&oe=683FECB8)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75302218_2068538016921333_8411850603412514976_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=qlA-ZAh8ozwQ7kNvwHdsurU&_nc_oc=AdkVM9js5F-vZTVkFv60NYIfhI6yJHm27OEOw8szIEBi7ywgiz5aVj5nhhk5u5FzMAU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=vyJXQtjp8DAWkxhNGLqp6A&oh=00_AfK7H4fS7AcZqMmBZSpl4t5r8DMVm_b0--mXe2W2Rg4GCg&oe=683FF224)
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.

There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
